titles.title: A joint resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the number of years during which the death tax under subtitle B of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is repealed should be extended, pending the permanent repeal of the death tax.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 347.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of Congress that the number of years during which the death tax under subtitle B (Estate and Gift Taxes) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is repealed should be extended, pending the permanent repeal of the death tax.
